original_title: Copeland - Your Love is a Slow Song (A Documentary)
overview: Copeland's constantly evolving career has spanned over 20 years and their influence is heard to this day. Through many ups and downs, they have always strived to experiment, innovate, and grow as a band. In this documentary, we take a look at the history of the group and the songs they have made.  Created by Kyle Brammer
title: Copeland - Your Love is a Slow Song (A Documentary)
